Home > 21 Dec 2011

Merry Christmas and happy geoyear!

Just thank you all for a great year of geomob conferences, 2012 will also embrace interesting speakers and fun geomob moments. We can anticipate so far that the first geomob meeting of next year will be on February the 16th, you can confirm your assistance now.

More information about the speakers to come soon.

Merry Christmas from the Geomob team!
